name: Geert Laier Christensen
goal:
The wealth and welfare of european citizens depend on a well functioning business sector, that creates jobs with a high level of productivity.Unnecessary regulation and low quality regulation makes this difficult.

I work to minimize unnecessary regulatory burdens for companies in the European Union.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market
euInitiatives: I am a member of the stakeholder group in the REFIT platform for better regulation
